Generation V.Black: These Pokémon vanish and appear unexpectedly. Many Trainers are drawn to their beautiful form and fur.
Generation V.White: Stealthily, it sneaks up on its target, striking from behind before its victim has a chance to react.
Generation V.Black 2: Their beautiful form comes from the muscles they have developed. They run silently in the night.

Generation VIII.Sword: Don't be fooled by its gorgeous fur and elegant figure. This is a moody and vicious Pokémon.
Generation VIII.Shield: This stealthy Pokémon sneaks up behind prey without making any sound at all. It competes with Thievul for territory.
